title: Greek Fennel and Lamb Burgers
ingredients: ['225g mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '900g minced lamb', '4 tablespoons breadcrumbs', '1 bulb fennel, chopped', '3 tablespoons shallots, minced', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '8 baps or burger buns']
